name: A Pony
descriptionHtml:
Passively gives flight and increases speed to 1.5 whether or not it has charges. Upon use, Isaac charges in the direction the pony is facing, giving invincibility during the charge and dealing 40 damage.
Now deals 4 times Isaac's damage, plus a flat 28 damage.

name: Anarchist Cookbook
descriptionHtml: Spawns six Troll Bombs around the room.

name: Best Friend
descriptionHtml: Spawns a decoy Isaac that explodes after 5 seconds, dealing 110 185 damage. Enemies will always target the decoy and ignore Isaac.

name: Blank Card
descriptionHtml:
Copies the effect of the card or rune currently held by Isaac.
No longer copies the effects of runes.

name: Blood Rights
quote: Mass enemy damage at a cost
descriptionHtml: Upon use, takes a full heart of health and deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room.

name: Bob's Rotten Head
descriptionHtml: Upon use, Isaac holds a poison bomb which can be thrown in the cardinal directions and explodes on impact.

name: Book of Revelations
descriptionHtml: Gives one Soul Heart, increases the chance for a Devil Room or Angel Room to appear after defeating the floor's boss, and sometimes/ always replaces the boss of the current floor to a Harbinger if possible.

name: Book of Secrets
descriptionHtml: Gives the effect of Treasure Map, The Compass, or Blue Map for the duration of the current floor.

name: Book of Shadows
descriptionHtml: Creates a protective shield, nullifying all types of damage in the current room for 10 seconds.

name: Box of Spiders
descriptionHtml:
Spawns 1-4 Blue Spiders that deal 2.5x damage to enemies.
Spawns 4-8 Blue Spiders that deal 2x damage to enemies.

name: Breath of Life
descriptionHtml: Grants a brief moment of invincibility when the charge bar hits zero. If the spacebar is held for an additional second after hitting zero, Isaac will take damage.

name: Butter Bean
descriptionHtml: Upon use, Isaac farts and knocks back nearby enemies and projectiles. Enemies pushed into walls or obstacles take 12 damage.

name: Converter
descriptionHtml:
Converts two Soul Hearts into one full Heart Container.
Converts one Soul or Black Heart into one full Heart Container.

name: Crack the Sky
descriptionHtml: Summons 5 beams of light in random locations on the ground, dealing large amounts of damage to any enemies that touch them.

name: Crystal Ball
descriptionHtml: Upon use, reveals the map (except the Super Secret Room) and drops a Soul Heart or random card/rune.

name: D10
descriptionHtml: Re-rolls all monsters in the room. Will attempt to re-roll monsters into ones with a similar amount of HP.

name: D100
descriptionHtml:
Combines the effects of D4, The D6, and D20.
Combines the effects of D1, D4, The D6, D7, D8, D10, D12, and D20.

name: D20
descriptionHtml: Rerolls all pickups in the current room.

name: D4
descriptionHtml: Rerolls all of Isaac's passive items.

name: Dad's Key
descriptionHtml: Upon activation, opens all doors in the current room in almost all circumstances, including doors which require a Key to open, entrances to Secret Rooms, and the door to Mega Satan.

name: Dead Sea Scrolls
descriptionHtml: Triggers the effect of a random activated item from a list of possible options (not every activated item is included).

name: Deck of Cards
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a random card.

name: Doctor's Remote
descriptionHtml: Creates a crosshair on the ground that can be aimed with tear controls. A missile strikes the spot after 2 seconds, creating a heavy damage explosion.

name: Flush!
descriptionHtml: Turns all non-boss monsters in the room into poop. Instantly kills poop-themed bosses.

name: Forget Me Now
descriptionHtml: On use, re-generates the current floor with a new layout. Isaac loses Forget Me Now, but keeps other items and consumables picked up on the original floor.

name: Guppy's Head
descriptionHtml: Spawns 2-4 friendly Blue Flies that damage enemies.

name: Guppy's Paw
descriptionHtml: Upon use, converts one Red Heart Container into three Soul Hearts.

name: Head of Krampus
descriptionHtml:
Fires a powerful Brimstone beam in four cardinal directions, much like Krampus shoots.

Fires a powerful Brimstone beam in four cardinal directions, much like Krampus shoots with a 50% chance to rotate all beams around Isaac 90 degrees.

name: How to Jump
descriptionHtml: Upon use, Isaac jumps in the direction he is currently moving, allowing travel over obstacles and enemies.

name: Isaac's Tears
descriptionHtml: Fires 8 tears around Isaac, which retain the damage, range, shot speed, and special tear effects. Each tear shot by Isaac increases item charge by one.

name: IV Bag
descriptionHtml: Upon use, Isaac loses half a heart of health (or a full heart in Chapter 4 onward) for a random amount of coins, similar to a Blood Donation Machine.

name: Kamikaze!
descriptionHtml: Creates an explosion around Isaac, damaging him and nearby enemies as well as destroying obstacles.

name: Lemon Mishap
descriptionHtml: Creates a tiny pool of yellow creep, damaging enemies that cross it.

name: Magic Fingers
descriptionHtml: Uses 1 coin to deal a large amount of damage to all enemies in the room.

name: Mom's Bottle of Pills
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a random pill.

name: Mom's Bra
descriptionHtml: Petrifies all enemies in the current room for around 4 seconds.

name: Mom's Pad
descriptionHtml: Inflicts fear to all enemies in the room for 5 seconds.

name: Monster Manual
descriptionHtml:
Spawns a familiar from a specific selection for the current room.
Spawns a familiar from a specific selection for the current floor.

name: Monstro's Tooth
descriptionHtml: A friendly Monstro jumps on a random enemy, dealing 120 area damage. Lands on Isaac if used in a room without enemies.

name: Mr. Boom
descriptionHtml: Places a Mr. Mega bomb that deals 110 damage.

name: My Little Unicorn
descriptionHtml: Gives invulnerability and +0.28 speed for six seconds, removing the ability to shoot tears and replacing it with the ability to deal 40 contact damage to enemies.

name: Notched Axe
descriptionHtml:
Isaac destroys obstacles and opens Secret Rooms by walking into them, but cannot shoot or pick up items until it's cancelled.
Toggles between tears and the pickaxe, which can be swung to attack and break obstacles. Using it depletes the charge, and it can't be used until next floor once the charge runs out.

name: Pandora's Box
descriptionHtml: Upon use, spawns specific pickups or items depending on the floor it is used on. Disappears after use.

name: Portable Slot
descriptionHtml: Upon use, consumes 1 penny and has a chance to drop a random pickup, like a Slot Machine.

name: Prayer Card
descriptionHtml: Gives an Eternal Heart per use.

name: Razor Blade
descriptionHtml: On use, takes one heart of health and grants +1.2 damage for the current room.

name: Red Candle
descriptionHtml: Throws a flame that that can pass over gaps (but not through obstacles). The flame damages everything in its path, diminishing in size as it hits enemies or blocks shots.

name: Remote Detonator
descriptionHtml: Bombs placed by Isaac only explode when Remote Detonator is used. Gives 5 bombs.

name: Satanic Bible
quote: Reusable evil... but at what cost?
descriptionHtml: Gives one Black Heart. Replaces the boss room item on the current floor with a Devil Deal.

name: Scissors
descriptionHtml: Turns Isaac's head into a stationary familiar for the current room which fires tears automatically. Isaac's body also shoots a controllable fountain of blood shots for the room.

name: Shoop Da Whoop!
descriptionHtml: Fires a laser from Isaac's mouth.

name: Spider Butt
descriptionHtml: Deals 10 damage to all enemies in the room and slows them for 4 seconds. Enemies killed by Spider Butt spawn Blue Spiders.

name: Tammy's Head
descriptionHtml: Shoots 10 tears in a circle around Isaac, which retain the Damage, Shot Speed, and special effects (such as poison) of Isaac's tears.

name: Telepathy for Dummies
descriptionHtml: Gives homing tears for the current room. Also gives +3 range.

name: Teleport!
descriptionHtml: Teleports Isaac to a random room on the current floor.

name: The Bean
descriptionHtml: Isaac farts, poisoning any enemy in close range.

name: The Bible
descriptionHtml: On use, Isaac gains flight for the current room. Instantly kills Mom, Mom's Heart, and It Lives when activated, but kills Isaac when used on Satan.

name: The Book of Belial
descriptionHtml:
+2 damage for the current room.
Guarantees a Devil Room or Angel Room will be open after beating a boss while holding it. Increases the chance by 12.5%.

name: The Book of Sin
descriptionHtml: Generates a random pickup, pill, card, or rune.

name: The Boomerang
descriptionHtml: Throws a boomerang which retrieves pickups, as well as damages and petrifies enemies hit for 2 seconds.

name: The Candle
descriptionHtml: Throws out a temporary flame that can pass over gaps (but not through rocks). The flame damages anything in its path.

name: The D6
descriptionHtml: Re-rolls all items in the current room into other items, depending on the current room's Item Pool.

name: The Gamekid
descriptionHtml: Turns Isaac into a into a Pac-Man-like creature for 6 seconds, granting invulnerability, inflicting fear on all enemies, and replenishing a Half Red Heart for every two enemies killed.

name: The Hourglass
descriptionHtml: All enemies in the room are slowed for 8 seconds.

name: The Jar
descriptionHtml: When at full health, up to 4 extra Red Hearts can be stored in The Jar.

name: The Nail
descriptionHtml: Gives one Soul Heart half a Black Heart. For the current room; +0.7 damage, -0.18 speed, allows Isaac to break rocks and damage enemies by walking over them.

name: The Necronomicon
descriptionHtml: Deals 40 damage to every enemy in the room.

name: The Pinking Shears
descriptionHtml: Gives flight for the current room, while turning Isaac's body into a fast, high damage familiar.

name: The Poop
descriptionHtml: Spawns a pile of poop where Isaac is standing and knocks back nearby enemies. May yield pickups like regular poop.

name: Undefined
descriptionHtml: Teleports Isaac to the Secret Room, Super Secret Room, Treasure Room, or I AM ERROR.

name: Unicorn Stump
descriptionHtml: Gives invulnerability and increased speed for five seconds, but removes the ability to shoot tears.

name: We Need to Go Deeper!
descriptionHtml: Creates a trapdoor to go to the next floor.

name: White Pony
descriptionHtml: Passively gives flight and increases speed to 1.5. Upon use, Isaac charges in the direction the pony is facing, giving invulnerability during the charge and dealing 40 damage while also casting the effect of Crack the Sky.

name: Yum Heart
descriptionHtml: Restores one full Red Heart.

name: Box of Friends
descriptionHtml: Duplicates all of Isaac's familiars for the current room. If Isaac has no familiars, spawns a Demon Baby for the room instead.

name: D12
descriptionHtml: Re-rolls all Rocks and Metal Blocks in the current room into other random objects, such as Bomb Rocks, TNT, or Poops. Poops and TNT cannot be rerolled into other objects with this item.

name: D7
descriptionHtml: Restarts the current room and brings back all enemies, allowing more rewards to be acquired by completing the room.

name: D8
descriptionHtml: Re-rolls Isaac's damage, tears, range, and speed.

name: Diplopia
descriptionHtml: Duplicates all pickups and item pedestals in the room.

name: Friendly Ball
descriptionHtml: Throwing the ball at a monster instantly kills and captures it. The captured enemy can later be released and will be friendly, fighting for Isaac and persisting between rooms.

name: Glass Cannon
descriptionHtml:
Fires a high-damage piercing spectral tear, but lowers Isaac's health to half a heart.
Fires a high-damage piercing spectral tear. If Isaac takes damage while holding this, he takes extra damage and it becomes Broken Glass Cannon.

name: Glowing Hour Glass
descriptionHtml: Rewinds time, putting Isaac back in the previous room and undoing anything that happened in the current room.

name: Jar of Flies
descriptionHtml: Killing an enemy adds a fly to the jar, up to a maximum of 20. On use, releases Blue Flies equal to the number of flies in the jar.

name: Kidney Bean
descriptionHtml: Isaac farts, charming all nearby enemies.

name: Mega Bean
descriptionHtml: Petrifies all enemies in the current room for a couple of seconds, poisons any enemies near Isaac, and sends a rock wave across the room in the direction Isaac is facing.

name: Mega Blast
descriptionHtml: Upon use, Isaac fires a laser similar to the one used by Mega Satan. This laser deals massive damage, lasts for approximately 15 seconds, and persists between rooms. Isaac is pushed backwards by the force of the laser while it is active.

name: Mine Crafter
descriptionHtml: Places an explosive TNT barrel that can be pushed and used to destroy rocks or damage enemies when used. If used a second time in the same room while the previous TNT barrel is still intact, it will remotely explode the TNT.

name: Mom's Box
descriptionHtml: Increases Luck by 1 and doubles the effects of trinkets while held. When used, drops a random trinket on the ground.

name: Placebo
descriptionHtml: When used, copies the effect of the pill Isaac is currently holding without consuming it. Does not copy the effects of cards or runes.

name: Tear Detonator
descriptionHtml: When used, will detonate any tears currently on the screen and cause each one to split into 6 more tears which will fire in a circle, similar to Tammy's Head.

name: Teleport 2.0
descriptionHtml: Teleports Isaac to a room that has not been explored yet. Normal rooms are prioritized over special rooms, and common special rooms take priority over rarer ones.

name: Ventricle Razor
descriptionHtml: Can be used to place an orange portal and a blue portal. Upon entering a portal, Isaac is teleported to the other portal.

name: Wooden Nickel
descriptionHtml: When used, has a 50% chance to drop a random coin.

name: Black Hole
descriptionHtml: Throws a black hole on the ground which sucks in and damages enemies.

name: Book of the Dead
descriptionHtml:
Upon use, creates a friendly Bony, Black Bony, or an orbital bone for each enemy killed in the current room.
Can also create a friendly Bone Fly or Revenant.

name: Broken Shovel
descriptionHtml: While held, causes 1 or more copies of Mom's Foot to stomp on Isaac. One of two parts necessary to create Mom's Shovel.

name: Brown Nugget
descriptionHtml: Spawns a stationary fly turret that fires tears at nearby enemies.

name: Clicker
descriptionHtml: Transforms Isaac into a random character and removes the last item collected.

name: Compost
descriptionHtml: Doubles Isaac's Blue Flies and Blue Spiders, or spawns one if Isaac has none. Converts pickups in the current room into Blue Flies or Blue Spiders.

name: Coupon
descriptionHtml: While held, guarantees one item in every Shop will be on sale. On use, makes a random item in the current room free.

name: Crooked Penny
descriptionHtml: Spawns a penny and has a 50% chance to double all items and pickups in the room. If the effect fails, the items and pickups disappear.

name: D Infinity
descriptionHtml:
Grants a random die item that changes each use.
Acts as any die item, and can by cycled by pressing the drop key.

name: D1
descriptionHtml: Duplicates a random pickup in the room.

name: Dataminer
descriptionHtml: Displaces enemy sprites for the current room, randomly increases one stat and decreases another.

name: Delirious
descriptionHtml: Spawns Delirium as a random friendly boss that fights for Isaac.

name: Dull Razor
descriptionHtml: Hurts Isaac without depleting health, activating any items that trigger upon taking damage.

name: Eden's Soul
descriptionHtml: Spawns two item pedestals then is consumed. Begins with no charges.

name: Mama Mega!
descriptionHtml: Damages all enemies and destroys all obstacles. The effect occurs every time a new room is entered for the rest of the floor. Opens the doors to the floor's Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms.

name: Metronome
descriptionHtml: Grants a random item effect for the current room.

name: Mom's Shovel
descriptionHtml: Creates a trapdoor that leads to the next floor upon activation. Unlocks when used on a mound of dirt that appears in Dark Room.

name: Moving Box
descriptionHtml: If the box is empty, picks up all items and pickups in a room and stores them. If the box is not empty, places all stored items and pickups in the current room.

name: Mr. ME!
descriptionHtml: Summons a controllable ghost that can perform various tasks depending on what it targets.

name: Mystery Gift
descriptionHtml: Upon use, spawns a random item from the current room's item pool, with a chance to spawn A Lump of Coal or The Poop instead.

name: Pause
descriptionHtml: Freezes all enemies until a fire button is pressed.

name: Plan C
descriptionHtml: Kills all enemies in the room, then kills Isaac three seconds later.

name: Potato Peeler
descriptionHtml: Removes a Heart Container, increases damage and range, and grants a Cube of Meat.

name: Sacrificial Altar
descriptionHtml: Sacrifices up to 2 familiars and spawns an item from the Devil Room pool for each familiar sacrificed. Converts all friendly spiders and flies into coins.

name: Sharp Straw
descriptionHtml: Damages all enemies in the room. Has a chance to drop a half red heart or half soul heart if an enemy is hit.

name: Smelter
descriptionHtml: Consumes Isaac's currently held trinket and applies its effect permanently.

name: Sprinkler
descriptionHtml: Upon use, creates a stationary sprinkler that rotates and fires tears in 8 directions. The tears copy Isaac's stats and most tear effects.

name: Telekinesis
descriptionHtml: Upon use, for the next two seconds, any enemy shots that come near Isaac are held in place. After the charge is depleted, they are fired back as tears.

name: Void
descriptionHtml: Consumes all pedestal items in the room. Active items will have their effects added to Void, and passive items will grant random stat upgrades.

name: Wait What?
quote: I can't believe it's not butter bean!
descriptionHtml: Isaac farts, sending out rock waves.

name: Abyss
descriptionHtml: Destroys all items in the room and gives Isaac a unique locust familiar for each item destroyed. Some items generate locusts with special effects.

name: Alabaster Box
descriptionHtml: Spawns three Soul Hearts and two Angel Room items and is consumed. Starts with no charges, and can only be charged by picking up 6 Soul Hearts.

name: Anima Sola
descriptionHtml: Chains down the nearest enemy for 5 seconds, preventing them from acting.

name: Bag of Crafting
descriptionHtml: Collects and holds up to 8 pickups. Holding the activate button crafts them into a passive item, with the power level based on the quality of pickups used.

name: Berserk!
descriptionHtml: Causes Isaac to go berserk for 5 seconds, greatly increasing his speed, tears, and damage, but restricting him to using a melee weapon instead of his tears. This item charges by dealing damage to enemies instead of clearing rooms.

name: Book of Virtues
descriptionHtml: On use, spawns a destroyable orbiting Wisp familiar that fires tears and deals contact damage. Also acts as a passive item that causes other active items to spawn themed Wisps.

name: Broken Glass Cannon
descriptionHtml: Begins with no charges and turns into Glass Cannon when used. Only acquired by taking damage while holding Glass Cannon.

name: Clear Rune
descriptionHtml: Has the same effect as the rune or soul stone currently held by Isaac.

name: Damocles
quote: A king's fortune... but at what cost?
descriptionHtml: Spawns a sword above Isaac's head, which doubles all item pedestals. After Isaac takes damage, the sword can randomly fall at any point, instantly killing him.

name: Dark Arts
descriptionHtml: Makes Isaac invulnerable and intangible for one second. When the effect ends, all enemies Isaac ran through take damage and Isaac temporarily gains +1 damage for each one.

name: Death Certificate
descriptionHtml: Takes Isaac to an abandoned and expanded version of Home, which has one copy of every item in the game. After taking an item, Isaac returns to the room he used Death Certificate in.

name: Decap Attack
descriptionHtml: Throws Isaac's head, which is still able to fire tears at the spot it lands. Reactivating the item or stepping on the head reattaches it.

name: Eraser
descriptionHtml: Throws an eraser that instantly kills the first monster it hits, and prevents that monster from spawning for the rest of the run. Can only be used once per floor.

name: Esau Jr.
descriptionHtml: Swaps between the current character and Esau Jr., who has +2 flat damage and flight. Characters have independent items and health. Dying as either character ends the run.

name: Eternal D6
descriptionHtml: Rerolls all items in the room. Each item has a 30% chance to disappear instead.

name: Everything Jar
descriptionHtml: Spawns certain pickups based on how many charges it has. If fully charged, instead has one of many unique effects.

name: Flip
descriptionHtml: Switch characters between Tainted Lazarus and Dead Tainted Lazarus.

name: Fortune Cookie
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a fortune, Soul Heart, Card, Rune, or trinket, similar to a Fortune Telling Machine. Fortunes are much more likely to be given than anything else.

name: Free Lemonade
descriptionHtml: Creates a large pool of yellow creep beneath Isaac.

name: Friend Finder
descriptionHtml: Spawns a random friendly monster that mimics Isaac's movements and attacks.

name: Gello
descriptionHtml: Spawns a demon familiar that's attached to Isaac and moves and fires in the direction Isaac shoots, using Isaac's damage, tears, range, shot speed, and special tear effects.

name: Genesis
descriptionHtml: Removes all of Isaac's items and pickups and takes him to a unique Bedroom with some pickups and Chests and a trapdoor to the next floor. For every item Isaac lost, he gets to take an item from a set of three.

name: Golden Razor
descriptionHtml: Spends five coins to increase Isaac's damage by 1.2 for the current room.

name: Hold
descriptionHtml: Exclusive to Tainted ???. Allows him to save one poop bomb for later, allowing him to gather more over time.

name: Jar of Wisps
descriptionHtml: Spawns random wisps that shoot various tears, block shots, and deal contact damage. The number of wisps spawned increases every time the jar is used.

name: Keeper's Box
descriptionHtml: Spawns a random shop item or pickup which can be bought for its normal price.

name: Larynx
descriptionHtml: Isaac shouts, damaging and pushing away nearby enemies. The shout gets stronger the more charges the item has. Can also be charged by taking damage.

name: Lemegeton
descriptionHtml: Spawns a wisp representing a random passive item, which orbits Isaac but can be destroyed. While the wisp is alive, Isaac gains that item's effects. The item wisp generated depends on the item pool of the room Isaac is currently in.

name: Magic Skin
descriptionHtml: Consumes one heart container or two soul hearts to spawn an item and give Isaac a broken heart container that can never be filled. If Magic Skin isn't being held after being used, it is very likely to replace any future items.

name: Meat Cleaver
descriptionHtml: Splits all enemies in the room into two smaller versions of themselves with much less health.

name: Mega Mush
descriptionHtml: Gigantifies Isaac for 30 seconds, increasing damage and range while lowering tears, granting invulnerability, and allowing Isaac to crush enemies and obstacles he walks on. The effect persists between rooms.

name: Mom's Bracelet
descriptionHtml: Lets Isaac pick up and throw rocks, TNT, poops, and other obstacles.

name: Plum Flute
descriptionHtml: Summons the boss Baby Plum to fight for Isaac in the current room.

name: R Key
descriptionHtml: Brings Isaac back to the first floor of a new run, retaining all of his items.

name: Recall
descriptionHtml: Retrieves the Forgotten's body from any distance. Only available as the Birthright effect for Tainted Forgotten.

name: Red Key
descriptionHtml: Creates a Red Room adjacent to a viable wall, indicated by the outline of a door. These rooms have a 10% chance to be a special room.

name: Sharp Key
descriptionHtml: Adds 5 keys on pickup. Allows Isaac to throw his keys to deal damage to enemies, destroy obstacles, and open doors.

name: Spin to Win
descriptionHtml: When used, gives Isaac +0.5 speed and greatly increases the rotation speed of Isaac's orbitals for 3 seconds. Gives Isaac a spinning top orbital that blocks enemy shots and deals contact damage to enemies while held.

name: Spindown Dice
descriptionHtml: Transforms all items in the room by decreasing their internal ID number.

name: Stitches
descriptionHtml: Passively spawns a familiar that moves in the direction Isaac shoots. On use, Isaac swaps places with the familiar.

name: Sulfur
descriptionHtml: Grants Brimstone for the current room.

name: Sumptorium
descriptionHtml: Holding down the fire button converts hearts into familiars that fire tears but can be destroyed. Activating converts the familiars back into hearts.

name: Suplex!
descriptionHtml: Isaac dashes forward and picks up the first enemy hit. After a moment, he slams them into the ground to deal damage and create a circular rock wave.

name: The Scooper
descriptionHtml: Summons a Peeper familiar for the current room, which leaves a trail of red creep.

name: Urn of Souls
descriptionHtml: Spews a stream of damaging flame. Gains Soul Charges each time an enemy dies, which are used to fuel the urn.

name: Vade Retro
descriptionHtml: While held, enemies leave behind ghosts on death. Using the item causes the ghosts to explode, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Stronger enemies leave bigger ghosts.

name: Wavy Cap
quote: Tears up. A mind changing experience!
descriptionHtml: Increases tears, decreases speed, and distorts the screen. All effects become more pronounced with repeated use, and wear off by clearing rooms.

name: Yuck Heart
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a Rotten Heart.

name: ???'s Only Friend
descriptionHtml: Spawns a controllable familiar that deals 37.5 damage per second on touch. It can be moved using the shooting directional keys

name: <3
descriptionHtml: Grants Isaac one Red Heart container and fully restores Isaac's health.

name: 1up!
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac an extra life. Upon death, he will respawn in the most recent non-hostile room with full health, after which 1up! will disappear.

Isaac fires two tears at once, one from each eye.
0.75x damage multiplier.

name: 3 Dollar Bill
descriptionHtml:
Gives Isaac a random tear effect every room.
Gives Isaac a random tear effect every few seconds.

name: 9 Volt
descriptionHtml: Reduces the charge of any activated item by 1. Any 1 charge items instead have timed recharges.

name: A Dollar
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac 100 pennies.

name: A Lump of Coal
descriptionHtml: The more distance tears travel, the more damage they will do.

name: A Quarter
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac 25 coins.

name: A Snack
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container. Heals 1 additional heart of health.

name: Abaddon
descriptionHtml:
+1.5 damage, +0.2 speed. Removes all Red Heart containers, grants six Black Hearts, and adds a chance to shoot fear tears.
+1.5 damage, +0.2 speed. Grants two Black Hearts, converts all Red Heart Containers into Black Hearts, and adds a chance to shoot fear tears.

name: Abel
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that mirrors Isaac's movements and shoots in the opposite direction.

name: Anemic
descriptionHtml: Increases range. After Isaac is damaged, a trail of red creep will be left behind him until he leaves the current room.

name: Ankh
descriptionHtml: Upon death, Isaac will respawn as ??? in the most recent non-hostile room, with 3 Soul Hearts.

name: Anti-Gravity
descriptionHtml: -2 Tear Delay. Tears float in position until firing ceases, after which they will fly off in the direction they were shot in.

name: Aquarius
descriptionHtml: A trail of blue creep is left behind Isaac, which damages enemies.

name: Aries
descriptionHtml: +0.25 Speed. Running into enemies while at a high speed will deal damage. Does not prevent contact damage.

name: Ball of Bandages
descriptionHtml: Creates an Orbital Familiar which deals 105/ 56 contact damage per second and blocks enemy shots. Collecting additional copies gives it the ability to shoot Charm tears, then chase enemies to deal contact damage, then deal even more contact damage.

name: Ball of Tar
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to shoot slowing tears. Isaac leaves a trail of slowing creep behind as he moves, impeding enemies' speed.

name: BBF
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that flies around the room in a zig-zag pattern and explodes on contact with an enemy. Respawns after ten seconds.

name: Best Bud
descriptionHtml: When hit, spawns a quickly orbiting attack fly similar to Forever Alone for the current room dealing 75 150 damage per second.

name: BFFS!
descriptionHtml: Increases the size and effectiveness of most familiars.

name: Big Fan
descriptionHtml: Spawns a large orbital familiar that blocks enemy shots and deals 30 damage per second to enemies.

name: Black Candle
descriptionHtml: Prevents curses. Grants one Black Heart. Increases the chance for a Devil or Angel Room to appear.

name: Black Lotus
descriptionHtml: Grants one Red Heart, one Soul Heart, and one Black Heart.

name: Blood Bag
descriptionHtml: Grants one Red Heart container, restores 5 Red Hearts, and increases speed by 0.3.

name: Blood Clot
descriptionHtml: Tears fired from the left eye have +1 flat damage, +5 range, and +0.5 tear height.

name: Blood of the Martyr
descriptionHtml: Increases damage by 1, and turns Isaac's tears into blood tears.

name: Bloody Lust
descriptionHtml: Increases Isaac's damage whenever he takes damage, up to six times. The bonus resets when entering a new floor.

name: Blue Cap
quote: HP + tears up + shot speed down
descriptionHtml: Gives one full Red Heart container, +0.7 tears, and -0.16 shot speed. Heals 2 additional hearts of health.

name: Blue Map
descriptionHtml: Reveals the locations of Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms on the map.

name: Bob's Brain
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that charges forward when shooting tears and explodes upon contact with an enemy, damaging and poisoning them. The familiar respawns after a few seconds.

name: Bob's Curse
descriptionHtml: Gives 5 bombs and grants Isaac's bombs a poison effect. Gives Isaac immunity to poison.

name: Bobby-Bomb
descriptionHtml: +5 bombs. Bombs gain a homing effect, slowly moving towards the nearest enemy.

name: Bogo Bombs
descriptionHtml: All Bomb pickups become Double Bombs.

name: Bomb Bag
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that drops a bomb every 3 rooms.

name: Boom!
descriptionHtml: Grants 10 bombs.

name: Box
descriptionHtml: Spawns various pickups: 1 coin, 1 key, 1 bomb, 1 Red Heart, 1 card/rune, 1 pill and 1 trinket.

name: Breakfast
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container. Heals 1 additional heart of health.

name: Brimstone
descriptionHtml: Tears are replaced by a laser beam that pierces through all enemies and obstacles in its path and deals high damage. Can only be fired after a short charge-up period.

name: Broken Watch
descriptionHtml: Chance upon entering a room to slow down or speed up every enemy and their attacks. The chance to slow enemies is quite higher than the chance to speed them up.

name: Brother Bobby
descriptionHtml: A familiar that follows Isaac around shooting normal tears.

name: Bucket of Lard
descriptionHtml: Grants two empty full Red Heart containers and heals Isaac by half a Red Heart, but decreases speed by 0.2.

name: Bum Friend
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that picks up coins for himself, giving random pickups in return. Does not spawn collectibles.

name: Butt Bombs
descriptionHtml: +5 bombs. Bombs now cloud up the screen, briefly damaging and confusing all enemies.

name: Caffeine Pill
descriptionHtml: Grants +0.3 speed, reduces character size, and gives a random pill.

name: Cain's Other Eye
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that floats slowly around the room on a zig-zag pattern similar to The Peeper and shoots normal tears in the same direction as Isaac.

name: Cancer
descriptionHtml: Adds 3 Soul Hearts. Grants The Wafer effect for the current room after taking damage.

name: Capricorn
descriptionHtml: Adds 1 Red Heart Container, gives +0.5 Damage, +0.1 Speed, +1.5 / +0.75 Range, and -1.0 Tear Delay, and gives 1 Bomb, Coin, and Key.

name: Cat-O-Nine-Tails
descriptionHtml: +1 damage, +0.23 shot speed.

name: Celtic Cross
descriptionHtml: Grants a chance to trigger the Book of Shadows effect upon taking damage, creating a shield that nullifies all types of damage for 7 seconds.

name: Ceremonial Robes
descriptionHtml: Grants 3 Black Hearts, and +1 damage.

name: Champion Belt
descriptionHtml: Increases damage, but also increases the chance of champion enemies appearing.

name: Charm of the Vampire
descriptionHtml: Heals Isaac for half of a Red Heart for every 13 enemies killed. +0.3 damage.

name: Chemical Peel
descriptionHtml: Tears fired from the left eye have +2 flat damage.

name: Chocolate Milk
descriptionHtml: Grants charged tears that deal greater damage when fully charged.

name: Contract From Below
descriptionHtml: Doubles the number of most room clear awards, but reduces the overall chance of getting one by 1/3.

name: Cricket's Body
descriptionHtml: Grants -1 tear delay and reduces range. When tears hit an object or deplete their range, they spawn 4 smaller tears, whose range and damage scale with Isaac's.

name: Cricket's Head
descriptionHtml: Increases Damage by 0.5, and increases damage multiplier by x1.5.

name: Cube of Meat
descriptionHtml: Creates an Orbital Familiar which deals 105/ 56 contact damage per second and blocks enemy shots. Collecting additional copies gives it the ability to shoot tears, then chase enemies to deal contact damage, then deal even more contact damage.

name: Cupid's Arrow
descriptionHtml: Grants Isaac piercing tears that travel through enemies (but not obstacles) instead of breaking on impact with them.

name: Cursed Eye
descriptionHtml: Grants charged tears that can be fired in a tight burst. Getting hit while charging will teleport Isaac to another room.

name: Daddy Longlegs
descriptionHtml: Daddy Long Legs' shadow follows Isaac and occasionally stomps enemies for 40 damage total.

name: Dark Bum
quote: He wants to take your life
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and collects Red Hearts. For every 1½ Red Hearts collected, Dark Bum will give a reward.

name: Dark Matter
descriptionHtml: +1 damage, adds a chance to shoot fear tears.

name: Dead Bird
descriptionHtml: After Isaac takes damage, spawns a flying familiar that chases enemies for the current room, dealing ~5 damage per second.

name: Dead Cat
descriptionHtml: Sets Isaac's Red Heart containers to 1, but grants 9 extra lives. After dying, Isaac respawns with 1 Red Heart Container.

name: Dead Dove
descriptionHtml: Grants spectral tears and flight.

name: Dead Onion
descriptionHtml: Grants piercing and spectral tears. Increases tear size (without increasing damage) while greatly reducing range and shot speed.

name: Death's Touch
descriptionHtml: +1.5 damage, -0.3 tears. Tears are replaced with large piercing scythes.

name: Demon Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and automatically fires at enemies in its reach.

name: Dessert
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container. Heals 1 additional heart of health.

name: Dinner
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container. Heals 1 additional heart of health.

name: Distant Admiration
descriptionHtml: Spawns an attack fly that circles further out than Halo of Flies, but closer than Forever Alone, dealing 75 damage per second.

name: Dr. Fetus
descriptionHtml: Tears are replaced by bombs that benefit from bomb-enhancing effects and slide for a fixed time after being fired.

name: Dry Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and blocks enemy projectiles. Upon blocking a shot, it has a chance of triggering The Necronomicon effect.

name: E. Coli
descriptionHtml: Enemies that touch Isaac are transformed into poop.

name: Epic Fetus
descriptionHtml: Isaac's tears are replaced with guided missiles, like those used by the Doctor's Remote.

name: Eve's Mascara
quote: DMG up, tears + shot speed down
descriptionHtml: Doubles damage, halves tears stat, and greatly reduces shot speed.

name: Experimental Treatment
quote: Some stats up, some stats down
descriptionHtml:
Randomly increases and decreases some of Isaac's stats.
Increases four random stats and decreases the other two.

name: Fanny Pack
descriptionHtml: Has a chance to drop a random pickup when Isaac takes damage.

name: Fate
descriptionHtml: Grants flight and one Eternal Heart.

name: Fire Mind
descriptionHtml: Grants flaming tears that deal burning damage over time. Tears have a chance to explode on impact with an enemy, which creates a fire at the location of the explosion.

name: Forever Alone
descriptionHtml: Spawns an attack fly that orbits a long distance from Isaac, dealing 30 damage per second.

name: Gemini
descriptionHtml: Spawns a conjoined familiar which chases enemies close to Isaac, dealing ~8 damage per second.

name: Ghost Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires spectral tears.

name: Gimpy
descriptionHtml: Gives chance of spawning a Soul Heart when taking damage. Enemies have a chance to drop a Half Red Heart after being killed.

name: Gnawed Leaf
descriptionHtml: After standing still and not shooting for a short time, Isaac turns invincible until he moves or shoots.

name: Goat Head
descriptionHtml: A Devil Room / Angel Room will always spawn after every boss fight, excluding the first floor and floors after Chapter 4.

name: Godhead
descriptionHtml: Grants homing tears with a damaging halo. +0.5 damage, -0.3 tears, +1.2 range, -0.3 shot speed, +0.8 tear height.

name: Growth Hormones
descriptionHtml:
+1 damage, +0.4 speed.
+1 damage, +0.2 speed.

name: Guardian Angel
descriptionHtml: Spawns an orbital familiar that blocks enemy shots, deals 105 damage per second to enemies, and increases the speed of all orbital familiars.

name: Guillotine
quote: DMG + tears up. An out-of-body experience!
descriptionHtml: Isaac's head is removed from his body and floats around him as an orbital. Gives +1 damage and grants -1 tear delay.

name: Guppy's Collar
descriptionHtml: Grants a permanent 50% chance to respawn with 1/2 of a Red Heart after death.

name: Guppy's Hair Ball
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that loosely follows behind Isaac, which blocks shots can be swung like a flail to damage enemies. Grows bigger by killing enemies.

name: Guppy's Tail
descriptionHtml: Room Clear Awards have a 1/3 chance of being replaced with a Chest and a 1/3 chance being replaced with nothing.

name: Habit
descriptionHtml: When Isaac is hit, his active item gains 1 room's worth of charge.

name: Halo of Flies
descriptionHtml: Spawns two Pretty Flies that block enemy shots and deal contact damage to flies.

name: Harlequin Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires two tears at once in a V-pattern.

name: Headless Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac, leaving blood creep on the ground.

name: Hive Mind
descriptionHtml: Increases the size of Blue Spiders and Blue Flies and doubles the amount of damage they deal. Also increases the effectiveness of fly and spider familiars.

name: Holy Grail
descriptionHtml: Grants flight and one Red Heart container.

name: Holy Mantle
descriptionHtml: Grants a shield that negates the first instance of damage taken, once per room. Does not apply to or negate self-damage ( Blood Donation Machines, etc).

name: Holy Water
descriptionHtml:
Spawns a bottle familiar that breaks when Isaac takes damage, leaving a puddle of blue creep.
A bottle familiar that flies forward when Isaac shoots. It breaks upon hitting an enemy, leaving a puddle of blue creep that petrifies enemies.

name: Hot Bombs
descriptionHtml: Grants 5 bombs. Isaac's bombs leave behind fire that damages enemies upon contact.

name: Humbling Bundle
descriptionHtml:
Replaces all regular red hearts, pennies, keys, and bombs with double versions worth twice as much.
Regular red hearts, pennies, keys, and bombs have a chance to be replaced with double versions worth twice as much.

name: Infamy
descriptionHtml: Chance to block projectiles coming from any direction.

name: Infestation
descriptionHtml:
1-3 Blue Flies randomly spawn every time Isaac gets hit.
2-6 Blue Flies randomly spawn every time Isaac gets hit.

name: Infestation 2
descriptionHtml: Spawns allied Blue Spiders from killed enemies.

name: Ipecac
descriptionHtml: Replaces tears with explosive and poisoning projectiles fired in an arc from the mouth.

name: Iron Bar
descriptionHtml: Increases damage by 0.3 and adds a chance to shoot concussive tears, causing enemies to walk around randomly.

name: Isaac's Heart
descriptionHtml: Isaac himself is now immune to all damage, and a heart familiar follows him. If the heart is hurt, Isaac is hurt. The heart charges up as Isaac shoots, firing 8 blood shots, knocking back enemies, and leaving a puddle of creep when released.

name: Jesus Juice
descriptionHtml: +0.5 damage, +0.25 range, +0.5 tear height.

name: Judas' Shadow
descriptionHtml: Upon death, respawns Isaac as Dark Judas with two Black Hearts in the most recent non-hostile room.

name: Juicy Sack
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and drips a trail of slow creep, spawning 1-2 Blue Spiders after each room.

name: Key Piece 1
descriptionHtml: Combined with Key Piece 2, unlocks the golden gate in the starting room of The Chest and Dark Room to fight Mega Satan.

name: Key Piece 2
descriptionHtml: Combined with Key Piece 1, unlocks the golden gate in the starting room of The Chest and Dark Room to fight Mega Satan.

name: Latch Key
descriptionHtml: Grants 1 Soul Heart and +1 luck. Spawns 2 Keys.

name: Lazarus' Rags
descriptionHtml: Upon dying, resurrect as Lazarus Risen in the current room with one Red Heart container and Anemic.

name: Leech
descriptionHtml: Spawns a leech familiar that chases enemies, dealing ~3 damage per second. Heals a Half Red Heart whenever Leech kills an enemy.

name: Leo
descriptionHtml: Isaac can destroy rocks by walking into them.

name: Libra
descriptionHtml: Gives 6 coins, 6 bombs, and 6 keys and balances out all attributes.

name: Lil Brimstone
descriptionHtml: Grants a familiar that charges a thin Brimstone laser while Isaac is shooting.

name: Lil Haunt
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that chases down enemies, dealing 4 damage per second and inflicting fear.

name: Little Baggy
descriptionHtml: Isaac can hold 2 pills at once and all cards and runes are replaced by pills.

name: Little C.H.A.D.
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar who drops a Half Red Heart every 3 rooms.

name: Little Chubby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a charger familiar that charges forward and deals contact damage to any enemies in its path.

name: Little Gish
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires slowing tears, impeding enemies' speed.

name: Little Steven
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar who follows Isaac around and fires homing tears.

name: Loki's Horns
descriptionHtml: Gives a random chance for projectiles to fire in all 4 cardinal directions.

name: Lord of the Pit
descriptionHtml: Grants flight and +0.3 speed.

name: Lost Contact
descriptionHtml: Isaac's tears can hit and destroy enemy projectiles. -0.16 shot speed.

name: Lucky Foot
descriptionHtml:
+1 luck. Increases chance of winning Shell Games and Fortune Tellers (independent from the luck stat).
Converts all bad pills into good pills, without identifying them.

name: Lunch
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container. Heals 1 additional heart of health.

name: Maggy's Bow
descriptionHtml: Gives one Red Heart Container and doubles the healing provided by Red Hearts. Also heals 1 Red Heart when obtained.

name: Magic 8 Ball
descriptionHtml: +0.16 shot speed, spawns a random tarot card. Increases the chance of finding a Planetarium.

name: Magic Mushroom
descriptionHtml: Makes Isaac bigger. Adds one Red Heart Container, +0.3 Damage, x1.5 damage multiplier, +5.25 / +1.5 Range, and +0.3 Speed, and restores all Health.

name: Magic Scab
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container, +1 luck.

name: Magneto
descriptionHtml: Pulls pickups towards Isaac.

name: Match Book
descriptionHtml: Grants Isaac one Black Heart, spawns two or three Bombs.

name: MEAT!
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container, +0.3 damage.

name: Midas' Touch
descriptionHtml: Enemies that touch Isaac are temporarily petrified and turn to gold. Any enemy killed while in this state will drop coins.

name: Mini Mush
descriptionHtml: Decreases Isaac's size, making him less likely to be hit. +0.3 speed, +1.5 tear height, -4.25 range (effective range is increased). +0.3 speed, +1.50 range.

name: Missing No.
descriptionHtml: Randomizes all passive items and stats upon pickup and at the start of each succeeding floor.

name: Missing Page 2
quote: Evil up. Your enemies will pay!
descriptionHtml:
Grants one Black Heart. Upon taking damage that reduces Isaac's health to one heart or less, deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room.
Deals 80 damage, and increases the damage of Black Hearts and The Necronomicon-like effects by 40.

name: Mitre
descriptionHtml: Grants a chance of converting any Red Heart pickups into Soul Hearts instead.

name: Mom's Coin Purse
descriptionHtml: Spawns 4 random pills near Isaac.

name: Mom's Contacts
descriptionHtml: +0.25 range. Adds a chance to shoot petrifying tears, which stop enemies in place and prevent them from moving or attacking.

name: Mom's Eye
quote: Eye in the back of your head
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a chance to fire tears from the back of his head.

name: Mom's Eyeshadow
descriptionHtml: Tears have a chance to charm enemies.

name: Mom's Heels
descriptionHtml: +5.25 range, +0.5 tear height. Enemies that touch Isaac take 12 damage.

name: Mom's Key
descriptionHtml: Adds 2 keys. Chests will drop additional pickups.

name: Mom's Knife
descriptionHtml: Isaac's tears are replaced by a knife that pierces enemies, can travel through obstacles and can hurt enemies while Isaac is holding it. Holding down the fire button before firing increases its range and power.

name: Mom's Lipstick
descriptionHtml: +5.25 range, +0.5 tear height. Spawns one random heart.

name: Mom's Perfume
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to shoot fear tears and decreases tear delay by 1.

name: Mom's Purse
descriptionHtml: Allows Isaac to hold 1 additional trinket.

name: Mom's Underwear
descriptionHtml: +5.25 range, +0.5 tear height. Spawns 3-6 Blue Flies on pickup.

name: Mom's Wig
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to spawn Blue Spiders when firing tears. Restores 1 red heart.

name: Money = Power
descriptionHtml: Increases damage by 0.04 for every coin Isaac has, up to +3.96 damage at 99 coins.

name: Mongo Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that copies the tears of Isaac's other familiars.

name: Monstro's Lung
descriptionHtml: Replaces normal tears with a charged shot that fires 14 tears in the same fashion as Monstro.

name: Mr. Mega
descriptionHtml: Grants 5 bombs, and makes all dropped bombs larger, which have an increased blast radius and increased damage.

name: Mutant Spider
descriptionHtml: Grants quadruple shot but decreases tears.

name: My Reflection
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac's tears a boomerang effect. +1.5 range, +1 tear height, x1.6 shot speed multiplier.

name: Mysterious Liquid
descriptionHtml: Tears leave a small, short lasting pool of creep on impact or when their range is depleted.

name: Mystery Sack
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that drops a Heart, coin, bomb, or key every 5-6 rooms.

name: Number One
descriptionHtml: Grants +1.5 tears, but severely reduces range.

name: Odd Mushroom
descriptionHtml: Grants one empty Heart container, +0.3 damage, +0.25 range, +0.5 tear height, and -0.1 speed.

name: Odd Mushroom
descriptionHtml: +1.7 tears, +0.3 speed, slightly reduces damage.

name: Old Bandage
descriptionHtml: Grants an empty Red Heart container. Adds a chance of dropping a Red Heart after taking damage.

name: Ouija Board
descriptionHtml: Grants spectral tears that travel through obstacles (but not enemies) instead of breaking on impact with them.

name: Pageant Boy
descriptionHtml: Spawns seven random coins around Isaac.

name: Pentagram
descriptionHtml: +1 damage, increases Devil Room / Angel Room chance by 10%.

name: PHD
descriptionHtml: Converts all bad pills into good pills, spawns one pill pickup, and identifies all pills. Restores two Red Hearts and increases the payout of Blood Donation Machines.

name: Piggy Bank
descriptionHtml: Gives 3 pennies on pick-up. Every time Isaac is damaged, he will drop one additional penny.

name: Pisces
descriptionHtml: -1 Tear Delay, adds knock-back shots and increases tear size.

name: Placenta
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container, and a chance to regenerate a Half Red Heart of health every minute of gameplay.

name: Polyphemus
descriptionHtml: Isaac fires huge tears that deal massive damage, but fire rate is greatly decreased. If a tear kills an enemy, it travels on with any leftover damage.

name: Proptosis
descriptionHtml: Tears start out massive with high damage, and then shrink down and become weaker over a short range.

name: Punching Bag
descriptionHtml: Spawns a Mulligan familiar that wanders randomly. Enemies will attack the Mulligan if it's closer.

name: Pyro
descriptionHtml: Grants 99 Bombs.

name: Pyromaniac
descriptionHtml: +5 bombs. Grants immunity to explosion damage and causes explosions to heal Isaac. Also grants immunity to fire.

name: Rainbow Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires tears with random effects.

name: Raw Liver
descriptionHtml: Grants 2 Red Heart containers and completely restores health.

name: Robo-Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that shoots Technology lasers.

name: Robo-Baby 2.0
quote: We worked out all the kinks
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that fires lasers at any enemy in its line of sight and moves based on the direction Isaac is firing tears.

name: Roid Rage
descriptionHtml:
+0.6 speed, +5.25 range, +0.5 tear height.
+0.3 speed, +1.50 range, +0.5 tear height.

name: Rosary
descriptionHtml:
Adds 3 Soul Hearts. The Bible will appear in any item pool.
Also a +0.5 tears up.

name: Rotten Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that spawns a Blue Fly when Isaac shoots. It can only have one Fly at a time.

name: Rotten Meat
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container. Heals 1 additional heart of health.

name: Rubber Cement
descriptionHtml: Tears bounce off walls, enemies, and environmental objects.

name: Sack of Pennies
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that drops a coin every 2 rooms.

name: Sacred Heart
descriptionHtml: Grants homing tears, x2.3 damage multiplier, +1 flat damage, +4.125 range, +0.75 tear height, -0.4 tears, -0.25 shot speed, a red Heart Container and replenishes all Red Hearts.

name: Sacrificial Dagger
descriptionHtml: Spawns a dagger orbital familiar, blocking enemy shots and dealing a high amount of damage to enemies in contact.

name: Sad Bombs
descriptionHtml: +5 Bombs. Upon exploding, bombs shoot 10 tears around them, affected by tear modifiers.

name: Safety Pin
descriptionHtml: Grants one Black Heart, +5.25 range, +0.5 tear height, +0.16 shot speed.

name: Sagittarius
descriptionHtml: Increases speed by +0.2 and grants piercing tears.

name: Samson's Chains
descriptionHtml: Attaches a ball and chain to Isaac that pulls behind him that damages enemies, blocks shots, and destroys most obstacles.

name: Scapular
descriptionHtml: Once per room, when Isaac is reduced to his last half heart, he is granted one Soul Heart.

name: Scorpio
descriptionHtml: Grants poison tears, which deal damage over time when inflicted.

name: Screw
descriptionHtml: +0.5 tears, +0.2 shot speed.

name: Sharp Plug
descriptionHtml: Damages Isaac in exchange for fully recharging Isaac's current activated item.

name: Sissy Longlegs
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that wanders randomly, occasionally spawning Blue Spiders.

name: Sister Maggy
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around shooting normal tears.

name: Skatole
descriptionHtml: Flies become harmless or less dangerous depending on the type.

name: Skeleton Key
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac 99 Keys.

name: Smart Fly
descriptionHtml: Spawns an orbital familiar that blocks enemy shots. Upon taking damage, the familiar will pursue enemies for the rest of the room, dealing 22.5 damage per second.

name: SMB Super Fan
descriptionHtml: +1 Red Heart container, +0.3 damage, +0.2 tears, +0.2 speed, +0.5 range, +1 tear height. Fully restores all red hearts.

name: Soy Milk
descriptionHtml: Tears are smaller and do much less damage, but fire in very rapid succession.

name: Speed Ball
descriptionHtml: +0.3 speed, +0.2 shot speed.

name: Spelunker Hat
descriptionHtml: Reveals type of adjacent rooms, including location for Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms.

name: Spider Bite
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to shoot slowing tears, reducing speed of enemy movement and any projectile fired by them.

name: Spiderbaby
descriptionHtml:
When hit, spawns 1-2 Blue Spiders.
When hit, spawns 3-5 Blue Spiders.

name: Spirit of the Night
descriptionHtml: Grants spectral tears and flight.

name: Spoon Bender
descriptionHtml: Grants Isaac homing tears.

name: Squeezy
descriptionHtml: Increases tears by 0.4, spawns 2 Soul Hearts.

name: Starter Deck
descriptionHtml: Isaac can hold 2 cards at once and all pills are replaced by cards.

name: Steam Sale
descriptionHtml: Reduces all Shop prices by 50%, rounded down to 7 coins for an item, rounded up to 2-3 coins for a pickup.

name: Stem Cells
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container and +0.16 shot speed.

name: Steven
descriptionHtml: Increases damage by 1.

name: Stigmata
descriptionHtml: Increases damage, and adds 1 heart container.

name: Stop Watch
quote: Let's slow this down a bit...
descriptionHtml:
Automatically inflicts slow to all enemies in every room.
Upon taking damage, inflicts slow to all enemies for the current room.
Slows all enemies in every room to 80% speed.

name: Strange Attractor
descriptionHtml: Pickups, trinkets, and monsters are magnetically attracted to Isaac's tears.

name: Super Bandage
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container and 2 Soul Hearts.

name: Synthoil
descriptionHtml: +1 damage, +5.25 range, +0.5 tear height.

name: Taurus
descriptionHtml: -0.3 Speed. Isaac builds speed while in a room with enemies. At max speed, he gains the My Little Unicorn effect for 5 seconds.

name: Tech.5
descriptionHtml: Isaac occasionally fires an unlimited range piercing laser alongside his normal tears. The laser can glitch, mimicking the effects of certain items and trinkets.

name: Technology
descriptionHtml: Replaces tears with a piercing laser with unlimited range.

name: Technology 2
descriptionHtml:
Decreases damage and replaces the tears fired from Isaac's right eye with a rapidly firing and piercing laser.
Reduces the tears of Isaac's left eye; damage is unaffected.

name: The Battery
descriptionHtml: Activated collectibles can store an extra level of charge, allowing them to be used twice in one room.

name: The Belt
descriptionHtml: Increases speed by 0.3.

name: The Black Bean
descriptionHtml: When taking damage, Isaac farts, causing poison damage to all enemies in range.

name: The Body
descriptionHtml: Adds 3 Red Heart Containers.

name: The Common Cold
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to shoot poison tears, dealing damage over time when inflicted.

name: The Compass
descriptionHtml: Reveals the locations and types of all special rooms on the map, except Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms.

name: The Halo
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container, +0.3 damage, +0.2 tears, +0.25 range, +0.3 speed, and +0.5 tear height.

name: The Inner Eye
descriptionHtml: Grants triple shot but decreases tears.

name: The Ladder
descriptionHtml: Allows Isaac to walk across gaps one square across by automatically placing a ladder between the two walkable sections.

name: The Ludovico Technique
descriptionHtml: Instead of firing tears, Isaac controls one floating tear that hover over obstacles. This tear deals constant damage when held in place over an enemy.

name: The Mark
descriptionHtml: Grants one Soul Heart, +1 damage, and +0.2 speed.

name: The Mind
descriptionHtml: Reveals the entire map, including all special rooms and Secret Rooms.

name: The Mulligan
descriptionHtml: Tears have a 1/6 chance of spawning allied Blue Flies when they hit an enemy.

name: The Negative
descriptionHtml: If Isaac has half a red heart or no red hearts after taking damage, all enemies in the room take significant damage. Allows entrance into the Dark Room. Also allows access to Home.

name: The Pact
descriptionHtml:
Grants two Soul Hearts, +0.5 damage, and +0.7 tears.
Grants two Black Hearts, +0.5 damage, and +0.7 tears.

name: The Parasite
descriptionHtml: Isaac's tears split in two when they hit something.

name: The Peeper
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that floats slowly around the room on a zig-zag pattern, damaging enemies it passes through.

name: The Polaroid
descriptionHtml: If Isaac has half a red heart or no red hearts after taking damage, he gains a shield that nullifies all types of damage for 5 seconds. Allows entrance into Chest. Also allows access to Home.

name: The Relic
descriptionHtml: Spawns a cross familiar that drops a Soul Heart every 5-6 rooms.

name: The Sad Onion
descriptionHtml: Increases tears by 0.7.

name: The Small Rock
descriptionHtml: Increases damage by 1, increases tears by 0.2, and decreases speed by 0.2.

name: The Soul
descriptionHtml: Grants two Soul Hearts. Isaac gains a pulsing aura that repels enemies and projectiles.

name: The Virus
descriptionHtml: Isaac poisons enemies on contact. -0.1 speed. +0.2 speed. Poisoned enemies have a chance to drop a black heart when killed.

name: The Wafer
descriptionHtml: All sources of damage that would cause more than one-half heart of damage are reduced to one-half heart instead.

name: There's Options
descriptionHtml: Two items appear after defeating a Boss. Only one can be taken; the other will disappear.

name: Thunder Thighs
quote: HP up + speed down + you feel stompy
descriptionHtml: Destroys rocks upon contact with Isaac. Adds one Red Heart container and lowers Speed.

name: Tiny Planet
descriptionHtml: Range up and makes shot tears revolve around Isaac until they drop.

name: Toothpicks
descriptionHtml: +0.7 tears, +0.16 shot speed.

name: Torn Photo
descriptionHtml: +0.7 tears, +0.16 shot speed.

name: Tough Love
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to shoot a tooth instead of a tear, which deals x3.2 Isaac's damage.

name: Transcendence
descriptionHtml: Grants flight.

name: Treasure Map
descriptionHtml: Reveals the map of each floor. It does not identify special rooms and does not reveal the locations of Secret Rooms / Super Secret Rooms.

name: Trinity Shield
descriptionHtml: Isaac gains a shield that protects him from enemy shots. It aims in the direction Isaac fires from.

name: Virgo
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to give a shield that nullifies all incoming damage for 10 seconds upon taking damage. Also converts bad pills into good pills.

name: Whore of Babylon
descriptionHtml: Grants +1.5 damage and +0.3 speed whenever Isaac has half a red heart or less (one red heart for Eve), ignoring any Soul or Black Hearts.

name: Wire Coat Hanger
descriptionHtml: Increases tears by 0.7.

name: Wooden Spoon
descriptionHtml: Increases speed by 0.3.

name: X-Ray Vision
descriptionHtml: Reveals and opens all Secret Room and Super Secret Room entrances.

name: 8 Inch Nails
descriptionHtml: +1.5 damage. Replaces Isaac's tears with nails, which have increased knockback.

name: Athame
descriptionHtml: When Isaac takes damage, a black ring briefly appears around him, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.

name: Betrayal
descriptionHtml: Every time Isaac takes damage, a charm effect is applied to every enemy in the room, causing them to attack each other rather than Isaac.

name: Binky
descriptionHtml: Grants one Soul Heart, +0.75 tears and decreases Isaac's size.

name: Black Powder
descriptionHtml: Isaac leaves a trail of black powder on the floor. Walking in a circle will spawn a pentagram symbol on the floor, which deals 10 damage per tick to any enemies inside it.

name: Bomber Boy
descriptionHtml: +5 bombs. Isaac's bombs will now explode in a large cross-shaped pattern (roughly 5 bombs explosions wide). This also affects player-spawned Troll Bombs.

name: Bumbo
descriptionHtml: Spawns a beggar familiar which picks up any nearby coins, leveling up after collecting several coins. At level 2, Bumbo gains a body. At level 3, it begins to fire tears. At level 4, Bumbo follows enemies and gains contact damage.

name: Bursting Sack
descriptionHtml: Spider enemies no longer target or deal contact damage to Isaac.

name: Cambion Conception
descriptionHtml: After taking damage a certain amount of times, a permanent demonic familiar spawns.

name: Car Battery
descriptionHtml: Causes Isaac's activated item to activate twice on each use.

name: Censer
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar which creates a circular aura that slows down enemies and enemy shots inside.

name: Chaos
descriptionHtml: Drops 1-6 random pickups on the floor. Causes items to be chosen from random item pools.

name: Charged Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that occasionally drops a Lil' Battery, gives an active item charge, or petrifies all enemies in the room.

name: Circle of Protection
descriptionHtml: Surrounds Isaac with a large white halo that occasionally deals Isaac's tear damage to enemies inside it, and can convert enemy shots into friendly homing tears.

name: Continuum
descriptionHtml: Grants spectral tears and increases range. Tears travel through walls and appear at the opposite side of the room.

name: Crack Jacks
quote: HP up. Don't swallow the prize!
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container and drops a random trinket.

name: Crown of Light
descriptionHtml: +2 soul hearts. While Isaac has no empty red hearts, grants 2x damage, +5.25 range, and -0.3 shot speed. Regardless of health, the crown deactivates for the current room when Isaac takes damage.

name: Curse of the Tower
descriptionHtml: Upon taking damage, spawns six Troll Bombs around the room, similar to the effect of XVI - The Tower.

name: Dead Eye
descriptionHtml: Isaac's damage increases each time an enemy is hit. Damage is reset upon missing a shot.

name: Deep Pockets
descriptionHtml:
Allows Isaac to carry two cards or pills (or a combination of both) at the same time.
Increases the coin cap to 999. If a room would otherwise yield no reward, 1-3 coins will spawn.

name: Eden's Blessing
quote: Tears up + your future shines brighter
descriptionHtml: +0.7 tears up. Grants a random item at the start of the next run.

name: Empty Vessel
descriptionHtml: Grants two Black Hearts. While Isaac has no red hearts, grants flight and periodically grants an invincibility shield for a few seconds.

name: Epiphora
descriptionHtml: Shooting in one direction increases Isaac's rate of fire until the cap is reached. As soon as Isaac changes direction or stops shooting, rate of fire is reset to its normal amount.

name: Evil Eye
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to fire a slow-moving eye that fires tears in the same direction as Isaac. The eye will be destroyed if it hits an enemy or obstacle.

name: Explosivo
descriptionHtml: Isaac's tears have a chance to stick to enemies and explode.

name: Farting Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and blocks enemy shots. If a shot hits Farting Baby, it has a chance to fart, which charms, poisons, or knocks back nearby enemies.

name: Fate's Reward
descriptionHtml: A blue head familiar that will follow Isaac and fire tears copying his tear effects and damage.

name: Friend Zone
descriptionHtml: Spawns a white attack fly that orbits somewhere between Distant Admiration and Forever Alone, dealing 45 damage per second.

name: Fruit Cake
descriptionHtml: Isaac's tears gain a random effect that changes every shot.

name: GB Bug
descriptionHtml:
Spawns a familiar that bounces diagonally around the room, applying a random status effect to enemies it hits and has a chance to re-roll pickups it passes over.
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac. Double tapping the fire button launches it forward, causing it to reroll the first monster or pickup it hits.

name: Glitter Bombs
descriptionHtml: +5 bombs. Bombs have a chance to drop random pickups or charm enemies when they explode.

name: God's Flesh
descriptionHtml: Tears have a chance to shrink enemies, making them run away from Isaac. Shrunk enemies can be crushed and killed by walking over them.

name: Head of the Keeper
descriptionHtml: Isaac's tears become coins and now have a chance to drop Pennies on the floor upon successfully hitting an enemy.

name: Holy Light
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to fire holy tears, which will create a damaging light beam in the area if they hit an enemy.

name: Host Hat
descriptionHtml: A host familiar that sits on Isaac's head and has a random chance to block enemy shots and retaliate with 3 tears. Grants immunity to explosions.

name: Immaculate Conception
descriptionHtml: Upon picking up a certain amount of health, spawn a permanent angelic familiar.

name: Incubus
descriptionHtml: Spawns a demonic familiar that shoots tears identical to Isaac's in terms of damage, tears, and tear effects.

name: Key Bum
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and collects Keys for himself, giving random Chests in return.

name: Kidney Stone
descriptionHtml: Randomly while firing tears, Isaac will stop firing and turn red, where he will charge and release a lot of 'tears' in one go. The burst of tears also includes a kidney stone, which deals a lot of damage.

name: Lil Chest
descriptionHtml: Spawns a chest familiar that spawns a random pickup (25% chance) or trinket (10% chance) upon clearing a room.

name: Lil Gurdy
descriptionHtml: A Gurdy Jr. familiar that charges up while Isaac is firing, bouncing around the room when released and dealing contact damage based on its speed.

name: Lil Loki
descriptionHtml: Spawns a Loki familiar that follows Isaac and fires 4 tears in a cross pattern.

name: Lost Fly
descriptionHtml: Spawns fly familiar that moves in a straight line and circles around the first wall or obstacle it hits, dealing 105 damage per second on contact.

name: Lusty Blood
descriptionHtml: Isaac's damage increases for the current room each time he kills an enemy.

name: Marked
descriptionHtml: Isaac will automatically fire tears directed at a red target on the ground. The target can be moved with tear controls. +0.7 tears, +3.15 range.

name: Maw of the Void
descriptionHtml: Charged by firing for 2.5 seconds and when released, creates a black ring around Isaac that rapidly deals damage. +1 damage, the ring can cause enemies to drop Black Hearts.

name: Milk!
descriptionHtml: Spawns a glass familiar that spills on the floor upon taking damage. After the milk spills, Isaac's tear delay is decreased by 2 for the current room.

name: Mom's Pearls
descriptionHtml: +1.25 range, +0.5 tear height, +1 luck. Grants one Soul Heart.

name: More Options
descriptionHtml: Two items spawn in every Treasure Room. Only one can be taken; the other will disappear.

name: Mr. Dolly
descriptionHtml: +0.7 tears, +5.25 range, +0.5 tear height, spawns 3 random types of Hearts on the floor when picked up.

name: Multidimensional Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that will follow Isaac's movements on a 2.5-second delay. Tears that pass through the baby will be doubled and increase in speed.

name: My Shadow
descriptionHtml: Each time Isaac takes damage, inflicts fear on all enemies in the room and spawns a black friendly Charger that will attack enemies. The Charger will be killed if it is damaged too much.

name: Night Light
descriptionHtml: A cone of light shines in the direction Isaac is moving that slows enemies and enemy shots.

name: Number Two
descriptionHtml: Continuously firing tears for three seconds causes Isaac to drop a Butt Bomb, which damages and confuses all enemies in the room when it explodes.

name: Obsessed Fan
descriptionHtml:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac's movements on a 3 second delay and deals 30 contact damage per second to enemies.
The fly follows Isaac on a 0.66 second delay.

name: Papa Fly
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac's movements on a 3 second delay, firing tears at nearby enemies.

name: Pay to Play
descriptionHtml: +5 coins. Turns doors that require a single Key into doors which need a coin to enter instead.

name: PJs
descriptionHtml: Grants 4 Soul Hearts and fully restores Isaac's health.

name: Pupula Duplex
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac spectral tears and gives his tears a wide arc shape, increasing their size.

name: Purity
descriptionHtml: Boosts one of Isaac's stats depending on the color of the aura around him. The aura disappears upon taking damage and reappears with a random color upon entering a new room. Red boosts damage, blue boosts tears, yellow boosts speed, and orange boosts range.

name: Restock
descriptionHtml: Causes shops to instantly restock their items when they are bought. Outside of Greed Mode, the restocked item's cost is increased after each purchase.

name: Rune Bag
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that drops a random rune every 5-6 ( 7-8) rooms.

name: Sack Head
descriptionHtml: Coins, bombs, keys, cards, runes and batteries have a chance to become sacks.

name: Scatter Bombs
quote: We put bombs in your bombs!
descriptionHtml: Adds 5 bombs. Isaac's bombs explode into 2-4 tiny bombs.

name: Seraphim
descriptionHtml: Spawns an angel familiar which follows Isaac and fires homing tears which deal 10 damage and have 75% shot speed.

name: Serpent's Kiss
descriptionHtml: Tears have a chance to apply a poison effect to enemies. Isaac poisons enemies on contact. Poisoned enemies have a chance to drop a black heart when killed.

name: Spear of Destiny
descriptionHtml: In addition to tears, Isaac holds a spear in front of him which deals contact damage equal to 2x his tear damage, and occasionally inflicts fear.

name: Spider Mod
descriptionHtml: Displays Isaac's tear damage and enemy health bars. Spawns a familiar that wanders around and inflicts random status effects on enemies it touches. Can spawn a Lil' Battery/Blue spider upon clearing a room.

name: Sticky Bombs
descriptionHtml: +5 bombs. Bombs stick to enemies and spawn 2-4 Blue Spiders if they kill an enemy.

name: Succubus
descriptionHtml: Spawns a flying familiar that bounces around the room with a black aura, dealing rapid damage to any enemies inside it. While standing in the aura, Isaac gains a 1.5x tear damage multiplier.

name: Sworn Protector
descriptionHtml: Spawns an orbital familiar which does 105 damage per second and attracts and blocks enemy shots. Upon blocking 10 shots in a room, it drops an Eternal Heart.

name: Tech X
descriptionHtml: Tears are replaced with laser rings that pierce through enemies and deal damage to enemies within them. Can be charged to increase the effectiveness of the ring.

name: The Wiz
descriptionHtml: Tears simultaneously fire out of both eyes diagonally, similar to the effect of the R U a Wizard? pill. Isaac's tears also travel above all obstacles.

name: Toxic Shock
descriptionHtml: Upon entering a room, poisons all enemies, dealing double Isaac's tear damage. Killing enemies leaves a small, short-lasting pool of green creep on the ground.

name: Tractor Beam
descriptionHtml: Increases Tears, Range, and Shot Speed. Isaac emits a beam from his face that his tears are bound to.

name: Zodiac
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a random zodiac item effect that changes every floor.

name: 7 Seals
descriptionHtml: Spawns a random Harbinger familiar that changes every 10 seconds. Harbingers have different behaviors and spawn themed Locusts.

name: Acid Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that drops a random pill every 3 rooms. Upon using a pill, all enemies in the room are poisoned.

name: Adrenaline
descriptionHtml: Increases damage based on how many empty Red Heart containers Isaac has.

name: Analog Stick
descriptionHtml: +0.35 tears up. Allows Isaac to fire tears diagonally.

name: Angelic Prism
descriptionHtml: Spawns an orbital familiar with a large orbital radius. Tears that pass through the prism split into four multi-colored tears.

name: Angry Fly
descriptionHtml: Spawns a fly familiar that orbits around a random enemy and deals 30 damage per second to enemies it comes in contact with.

name: Apple!
descriptionHtml: Increases tears. Adds a chance to fire a high-damage razor blade.

name: Backstabber
descriptionHtml: Isaac's tears deal double damage and inflict bleeding on enemies if they're facing away from Isaac.

name: Belly Button
descriptionHtml: Drops a random trinket. Grants a second trinket slot.

name: Big Chubby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and charges across the room when Isaac fires, blocking shots and dealing 40.5 damage per second on contact.

name: Blanket
descriptionHtml: Grants one Soul Heart. Upon entering a boss room, grants a shield that blocks one hit, then disappears.

name: Bloodshot Eye
descriptionHtml: Spawns an orbital familiar that deals 30 damage per second and fires a randomly angled tear every 2 seconds.

name: Bozo
descriptionHtml: +0.1 flat damage, grants a Soul Heart. Enemies can randomly become briefly charmed or feared. Taking damage has a chance to spawn a rainbow poop.

name: Brittle Bones
descriptionHtml: Replaces all Red Hearts with 6 empty Bone Hearts. Upon losing a Bone Heart, Isaac fires bones in 8 directions and permanently gains a tears up.

name: Broken Modem
descriptionHtml: Enemies, enemy shots, tears, and pickups will briefly freeze in place at random intervals.

name: Broken Shovel
descriptionHtml: One of two parts necessary to create Mom's Shovel. No effect if somehow obtained on its own.

name: Buddy in a Box
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar with a random tear effect. The familiar is randomized at the start of each floor.

name: Camo Undies
descriptionHtml: Isaac becomes camouflaged at the beginning of each room. Until he shoots, all non-boss enemies will be confused.

name: Compound Fracture
descriptionHtml: Increases range. Tears turn into bones, which shatter into 1-3 bone shards upon hitting an enemy or obstacle.

name: Cone Head
descriptionHtml: Grants a Soul Heart. Gives Isaac a chance to ignore any damage taken.

name: Contagion
descriptionHtml: The first enemy killed in a room explodes and poisons nearby enemies. Poisoned enemies will also explode upon death.

name: Dad's Lost Coin
descriptionHtml: +1.5 range. Drops a Lucky Penny.

name: Dad's Ring
descriptionHtml: Creates a ring of light around Isaac that petrifies enemies in contact.

name: Dark Prince's Crown
descriptionHtml: When at exactly one Red Heart, increases tears, range, tear height, and shot speed.

name: Dead Tooth
descriptionHtml: While firing, Isaac gains a green aura that poisons nearby enemies.

name: Death's List
descriptionHtml: Grants a pickup or stat upgrade if all enemies in a room are killed in the order they are marked.

name: Depression
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that leaves a trail of creep that damages enemies at 6 damage per second. Has a chance to spawn damaging beams of light onto enemies that touch the cloud.

name: Divorce Papers
descriptionHtml: Grants one Bone Heart, +0.7 tears, spawns a Mysterious Paper.

name: Dog Tooth
descriptionHtml: +0.3 damage, +0.1 speed. Plays a howl or bark sound when entering a room with undiscovered Secret Rooms or Crawl Spaces.

name: Duality
descriptionHtml: Whenever a Devil or Angel Room would spawn after defeating a boss, both rooms spawn. Only one can be entered.

name: Eucharist
descriptionHtml: An Angel Room door will always spawn after every boss fight, excluding the first floor and floors after Womb II/ Utero II/.

name: Euthanasia
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to fire needles that instantly kill basic enemies and deal triple damage to bosses. If a needle kills an enemy, it bursts into more tears/needles.

name: Eye of Belial
descriptionHtml: Grants piercing tears. After piercing one enemy, tears start homing and deal double damage.

name: Eye of Greed
descriptionHtml: Every 20 tears, Isaac loses 1 coin and shoots an additional gold tear that petrifies enemies and turns them into gold. Any enemy killed while in this state will drop coins.

name: Fast Bombs
descriptionHtml: Grants 7 bombs and allows bombs to be placed rapidly.

name: Finger!
descriptionHtml: Spawns a finger familiar that points at enemies, dealing scaling damage.

name: Flat Stone
descriptionHtml: Tears bounce off the floor, creating splashes. Splashes deal 25% of Isaac's tear damage to all enemies in a small area.

name: Ghost Pepper
descriptionHtml:
Gives a chance to shoot fires alongside tears that block enemy shots and deal damage to enemies that touch them.
Gives a chance to shoot blue fires alongside tears that become smaller as they travel.

name: Glaucoma
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to shoot tears that confuse enemies for an extremely long time.

name: Glyph of Balance
descriptionHtml: Grants 2 Soul Hearts and modifies drops from Champion monsters based on certain conditions. Also modifies room clear drops.

name: Greed's Gullet
descriptionHtml: Grants a Red Heart container for every 25 coins Isaac has.

name: Haemolacria
descriptionHtml: Tears are now fired in an arc. Upon hitting the floor, an obstacle, or an enemy, they burst into many smaller tears in all directions. Increases tear delay.

name: Hallowed Ground
descriptionHtml: Spawns a white poop familiar, which turns into a white poop when Isaac is hurt. White poop has an aura that increases tear fire rate and can block enemy shots.

name: Hushy
descriptionHtml: Spawns a Hush familiar that bounces diagonally around the room and deals contact damage. While firing tears, it stops moving.

name: Jacob's Ladder
descriptionHtml: Tears fire sparks of electricity in random directions upon hitting an obstacle or enemy.

name: Jaw Bone
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that flies through the room while firing, dealing a flat 7 contact damage to enemies and retrieving pickups.

name: Jumper Cables
descriptionHtml: Grants an active item charge every 15 enemies killed.

name: King Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and makes other familiars follow it. While firing tears, other familiars stop moving.

name: Lachryphagy
descriptionHtml: Isaac's tears decelerate as they travel. Upon stopping or hitting an obstacle, they burst into 8 tears in all directions. Tears can be fired into other tears to feed them, increasing their damage.

name: Large Zit
