descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to fire a creep shot that deals double damage and leaves a trail of slowing white creep.

name: Lead Pencil
descriptionHtml: After every 15 tears fired, Isaac will fire a high-damage cluster of tears.

name: Leprosy
descriptionHtml: Upon taking damage, grants a body part as an orbital, which blocks enemy shots and deals 7 damage per tick to enemies it comes in contact with. The orbitals will be destroyed if they take enough damage from enemies or enemy shots.

name: Lil Delirium
descriptionHtml: Grants a familiar that transforms into another random familiar every 10 seconds.

name: Lil Monstro
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that fires clusters of tears. Must be charged before shooting.

name: Lil Spewer
descriptionHtml: Drops a random pill, and spawns a familiar that charges up and fires creep. Using pills changes the creep type.

name: Linger Bean
descriptionHtml: Constantly shooting causes Isaac to release gas clouds that can be pushed by his tears and damage nearby enemies.

name: Little Horn
descriptionHtml:
Adds a chance to fire a piercing tear that instantly kills any enemy that it touches.
Adds a chance to fire a tear that summons Big Horn's hand to crush the first enemy it hits, instantly killing monsters or greatly damaging bosses.

name: Marbles
descriptionHtml: Spawns 3 random trinkets, 5% chance to swallow held trinket after taking damage, gaining its effect permanently.

name: Marrow
descriptionHtml: Grants one Bone Heart and spawns three Red Hearts.

name: Metal Plate
descriptionHtml: Grants one Soul Heart. Enemy shots have a chance to be reflected at the shooter as confusing tears.

name: Midnight Snack
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container. Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

name: Mom's Razor
descriptionHtml: Spawns an orbiting razor that deals contact damage and inflicts bleeding on enemies, causing them to slowly take damage over time.

name: Mystery Egg
descriptionHtml: Spawns an egg familiar, which cracks into a random friendly monster when Isaac is hurt. The egg regenerates upon entering a different room.

name: Parasitoid
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to fire an egg sack which creates slowing creep and spawns a Blue Fly or Blue Spider upon hitting an enemy.

name: Pointy Rib
descriptionHtml: Spawns a bone familiar that hovers back and forth in front of Isaac, dealing damage equal to Isaac's damage.

name: Poke Go
descriptionHtml: Upon entering a room with enemies in it, has a chance to spawn a random friendly enemy that persists across rooms.

name: Polydactyly
descriptionHtml: Allows Isaac to carry two cards, pills, or any combination of both. Spawns one random card, rune, or pill.

name: Pop!
descriptionHtml: Replaces Isaac's tears with eyeballs that can bounce off of each other. The eyeballs are not limited by range, and will instead dissipate when they stop moving or when hitting an enemy or obstacle.

name: Sack of Sacks
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that drops a sack every 5-6 rooms cleared.

name: Schoolbag
descriptionHtml: Allows Isaac to hold two active items.

name: Shade
descriptionHtml: Spawns a shadow familiar that follows Isaac's movements on a 1 second delay and deals contact damage to enemies. After dealing enough damage, it is absorbed by Isaac and spawns friendly Chargers.

name: Shard of Glass
descriptionHtml:
Upon taking damage, Isaac has a chance to drop a full red heart, gain 5 range, and leave a trail of damaging red creep for the current room.
Taking damage causes Isaac to bleed, spraying a volley of blood in the direction he fires. Bleeding will eventually damage him, but it can be stopped by picking up a Red Heart.

name: Sinus Infection
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to fire a booger that sticks to enemies and deals damage over time.

name: Slipped Rib
descriptionHtml: Spawns a bone familiar that circles around Isaac and reflects enemy shots.

name: Sulfuric Acid
descriptionHtml: +0.3 damage. Adds a chance to fire acidic tears which can destroy obstacles.

name: Tarot Cloth
descriptionHtml: Drops a random card or rune. Doubles the effects of most cards and runes. Doubles the effects of tarot cards.

name: Technology Zero
descriptionHtml: Connects Isaac's tears with electricity that can damage enemies.

name: Trisagion
descriptionHtml: Damage down. Tears are replaced with piercing white blasts of light that can damage the same enemy multiple times.

name: Varicose Veins
descriptionHtml: Taking damage releases a ring of 10 high damage tears.

name: YO LISTEN!
descriptionHtml: +1 luck. Spawns a fairy familiar that points out Secret Rooms, Crawl Space entrances, and tinted rocks.

name: 120 Volt
descriptionHtml: Repeatedly zaps enemies that are close to Isaac.

name: 2Spooky
descriptionHtml: Enemies near Isaac are afflicted with fear.

name: 4.5 Volt
quote: Beat the juice out of them!
descriptionHtml: Active items don't charge when clearing rooms. Instead, they're charged by dealing damage to enemies.

name: A Bar of Soap
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac +0.5 Tears and +0.2 Shot Speed.

name: A Pound of Flesh
descriptionHtml: Devil deals now cost coins, shop items now cost health, and consumables in shops are free but surrounded by spikes.

name: Act of Contrition
descriptionHtml: Increases tears and grants an Eternal Heart. Allows Angel Rooms to appear even if a Devil deal has been taken before. Greatly boosts Devil/Angel Deal chance if Isaac has taken Red Heart damage.

name: Akeldama
descriptionHtml: While in an uncleared room, Isaac forms a trail of bloody tears that drags behind him, bursting and dealing damage upon contact with enemies.

name: Almond Milk
quote: DMG down + tears up + you feel nutty
descriptionHtml: Quadruples fire rate, with x0.3 damage multiplier. Tears are given random worm trinket effects.

name: Astral Projection
descriptionHtml: Causes Isaac to turn into a ghost if he gets hit while in an uncleared room, giving him flight and spectral tears and blocking the next hit he takes.

name: Azazel's Rage
descriptionHtml: Isaac builds rage every time a room is cleared. After four rooms, fires a large Brimstone laser when entering the next room.

name: Battery Pack
descriptionHtml: Recharges Isaac's currently held active item and drops 2-4 batteries.

name: Belly Jelly
descriptionHtml: Causes enemies to bounce off of Isaac, dealing damage to them if they hit an enemy or obstacle. Also gives Isaac the chance to deflect enemy shots.

name: Binge Eater
descriptionHtml: +1 Red Heart Container and fully heals Isaac. Item pedestals cycle between their initial item and one of several food items, and picking up food items grants a temporary damage boost and a permanent boost to 2 stats (different for each one) in addition to their normal effects. Food items will also heal 2 additional Red Hearts when picked up.

name: Bird Cage
descriptionHtml: The first time Isaac takes damage in a room, a familiar leaps on an enemy, dealing damage and releasing a rock wave. For the rest of the room, it chases enemies similar to Dead Bird.

name: Bird's Eye
descriptionHtml: Gives a chance to shoot fires alongside tears that block enemy shots and deal damage to enemies that touch them.

name: Birthright
descriptionHtml: Has a different effect for each character.

name: Blood Bombs
descriptionHtml: Grants a Red Heart container and restores 5 hearts. Bombs leave behind damaging red creep. Isaac can place bombs at the cost of half a heart if he doesn't have any.

name: Blood Oath
descriptionHtml: Stabs Isaac at the beginning of each floor, draining his red hearts. Increases damage and speed for the floor based on the amount drained.

name: Blood Puppy
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that chases enemies. After killing enough enemies, it becomes more powerful but will also try to hurt Isaac. Attacking it returns it to normal.

name: Bloody Gust
descriptionHtml: When Isaac takes damage, he gains speed and tears for the rest of the floor.

name: Boiled Baby
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a familiar that fires chaotic bursts of tears in all directions.

name: Bone Spurs
descriptionHtml: Enemies spawn floating bones on death, which block shots and damage/repel enemies that touch them.

name: Booster Pack
descriptionHtml: Spawns 5 random cards.

name: Bot Fly
descriptionHtml: Spawns an orbiting fly familiar that fires shielded tears at incoming enemy projectiles.

name: Brimstone Bombs
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac +5 bombs and causes his bombs to fire Brimstone lasers in the cardinal directions upon exploding.

name: C Section
descriptionHtml: Not fully implemented.

name: Candy Heart
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a permanent stat boost whenever he heals with red heart pickups.

name: Card Reading
descriptionHtml: Spawns two portals at the beginning of each floor that each lead to either the Boss Room, Secret Room, or Treasure Room.

name: Consolation Prize
descriptionHtml: Increases Isaac's lowest stat and drops either 3 coins, 1 bomb, or 1 key depending on what Isaac has the least of.

name: Cracked Orb
descriptionHtml: Unlocks doors and reveals a random room on the map when Isaac takes damage.

name: Cube Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns an ice cube familiar that slides around when walked into. It slows and deals contact damage, freezing monsters it kills.

name: Dad's Note
descriptionHtml: Begins the sequence to access Home.

name: Dirty Mind
descriptionHtml: Destroying poop spawns Dip Familiars that follow Isaac and damage enemies. Destroying different types of poop spawns different Dips with special effects.

name: Divine Intervention
descriptionHtml: Double tapping a fire key creates a shield that pushes away enemies and reflects enemy projectiles and lasers.

name: Dogma
descriptionHtml: Grants flight, +0.1 speed, +2 damage, and the Holy Mantle effect. Grants enough health to have 6 full hearts, if possible. Automatically given to Isaac after defeating Dogma.

name: Dream Catcher
descriptionHtml: During the transition between floors, Isaac's nightmare shows the floor's Treasure Room item and boss. Grants half a soul heart when entering a new floor.

name: Echo Chamber
quote: I can see see the future future future
descriptionHtml: When Isaac uses a card, pill, or rune, he also uses a copy of every card/pill/rune he used after picking up Echo Chamber.

name: Empty Heart
descriptionHtml: If Isaac has one red heart or less at the beginning of a floor, he gains an empty red heart container.

name: Evil Charm
descriptionHtml: Increases luck by 2.0. Provides immunity to burn, confusion, fear, and poison.

name: Eye Drops
descriptionHtml: Lowers the tear delay in Isaac's left eye, causing his eyes to fire at different rates.

name: Eye of the Occult
quote: DMG up + range up + controlled tears
descriptionHtml: Isaac's tears are now controlled mid-flight with tear controls. Also increases damage and range, but decreases shot speed.

name: Eye Sore
descriptionHtml: Causes Isaac to occasionally fire extra tears in random directions while shooting.

name: False PHD
descriptionHtml: Converts good pills into bad pills and identifies all pills. Bad pills now have secondary positive effects. Grants one Black Heart.

name: Freezer Baby
descriptionHtml: Spawns a shooting familiar that has a chance to petrify enemies, and Freezes monsters upon killing them.

name: Fruity Plum
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a miniature Baby Plum familiar that propels itself diagonally around the room, firing tears behind itself as it travels.

name: Ghost Bombs
descriptionHtml: +5 bombs. Bombs become spectral and spawn ghosts that deal contact damage to enemies and explode after 10 seconds.

name: Giant Cell
descriptionHtml: Causes Isaac to spawn micro-Isaacs when he takes damage, which chase and shoot at nearby enemies.

name: Glitched Crown
descriptionHtml: Before being picked up, item pedestals cycle between 5 random items.

name: Guppy's Eye
descriptionHtml: Shows the contents of Chests, Sacks, and Fire Places before they're opened/bombed.

name: Heartbreak
descriptionHtml: Grants 3 broken hearts and +0.25 damage for every broken heart Isaac has. Every otherwise fatal hit will add 2 more until Isaac has nothing but broken hearts.

name: Hemoptysis
descriptionHtml: Double-tapping a fire button causes Isaac to sneeze blood, dealing damage to enemies in front of him.

name: Hungry Soul
descriptionHtml: Enemies have a chance to spawn ghosts on death, which chase and deal contact damage to enemies and explode after a short time.

name: Hypercoagulation
descriptionHtml: After Isaac takes damage from an enemy or donates health, launches red hearts from Isaac that despawn after 1.5 seconds.

name: IBS
descriptionHtml: Causes Isaac to throw poop, create buffing creep, or drop bombs while fighting enemies.

name: Immaculate Heart
descriptionHtml: Adds one Red Heart Container and fully restores health. x1.2 damage multiplier. Isaac will occasionally fire extra tears that orbit around him.

name: Inner Child
descriptionHtml: Upon death, Isaac respawns in the current room with half of a Red Heart, a massive size down, and +0.2 Speed.

name: Isaac's Tomb
descriptionHtml: Spawns an Old Chest at the start of each floor.

name: It Hurts
descriptionHtml: Releases a ring of tears and increases tears for the current room when Isaac takes damage.

name: Jupiter
descriptionHtml: +2 red Heart containers, -0.3 speed. Isaac builds speed while standing still, and releases poison gas clouds when he moves afterwards.

name: Keeper's Kin
descriptionHtml: Rocks and props spawn blue spiders over time while in a room with enemies, and spawn two blue spiders when destroyed.

name: Keeper's Sack
descriptionHtml: Gives range, speed, or damage when buying things from a shop. Also spawns three coins and a key on pickup.

name: Knife Piece 1
descriptionHtml: Combined with Knife Piece 2, creates a knife familiar that damages enemies and can open the door to the Corpse.

name: Knife Piece 2
descriptionHtml: Combined with Knife Piece 1, creates a knife familiar that damages enemies and can open the door to the Corpse.

name: Knockout Drops
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to shoot a fist tear that has extremely high knockback and confuses enemies.

name: Lil Abaddon
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that charges a miniature Maw of the Void attack while Isaac shoots.

name: Lil Dumpy
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a Dumpy familiar that pushes, confuses, or poisons nearby enemies and flies in a random direction after taking damage.

name: Lil Portal
descriptionHtml: A familiar that flies forward, consuming pickups in its path. Each one will increase its size and damage and spawn a Blue Fly. Every four pickups, it opens a portal that leads to an unexplored room.

name: Lodestone
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac the chance to fire tears that magnetize enemies they hit, causing them to attract nearby pickups and enemies, as well as tears/shots from all sources.

name: Lost Soul
descriptionHtml: Creates a ghostly familiar that closely follows behind Isaac. It dies in one hit, but respawns at the start of the next floor. Each time it survives until the next floor, it rewards Isaac with Soul Hearts, Eternal Hearts, or an item.

name: Luna
quote: The moon's blessing shines upon you
descriptionHtml: Adds an extra Secret Room and Super Secret Room to each floor. Secret Rooms contain a beam of light that increases tears for the current floor and gives half a soul heart.

name: Mars
descriptionHtml: Dash by double-tapping the movement key, becoming invulnerable and damaging enemies. There's a short cooldown before Isaac can dash again.

name: Member Card
descriptionHtml: Adds a trapdoor to every shop that leads to a second shop with a unique stock and marked-up prices.

name: Mercurius
descriptionHtml: +0.4 speed. Doors stay open after entering a room, even in rooms with enemies.

name: Monstrance
descriptionHtml: Isaac gains an aura that deals damage to enemies inside it.

name: Montezuma's Revenge
descriptionHtml: While firing, Isaac charges up a short-ranged Brimstone-like diarrhea beam that shoots behind him.

name: Mucormycosis
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac the chance to fire spore tears that stick to enemies and blow up after a few seconds, dealing damage and poisoning nearby enemies and releasing more spores.

name: Nancy Bombs
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac +5 bombs and gives his bombs random bomb synergies.

name: Neptunus
descriptionHtml: Isaac's mouth fills with tears over time while not firing, up to a cap. Holding the fire button will release all stored tears in rapid succession.

name: Ocular Rift
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac the chance to fire tears that create rifts where they land, which damage nearby enemies and pull in enemies, pickups, and tears/shots from all sources.

name: Options?
descriptionHtml: If a room gives a reward when cleared, there will be two different rewards to chose from. Taking one causes the other to disappear.

name: Orphan Socks
quote: Speed up + your feet feel stronger
descriptionHtml: Prevents creep and floor spikes from damaging Isaac. Also gives Isaac +0.3 speed and 2 soul hearts.

name: Paschal Candle
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a candle familiar that grants a Tears bonus of +0.4 for each room cleared in a row without taking damage, which stacks up to 5 times, represented by how brightly the flame burns. Starts at 1 stack, and resets to zero if damage is taken.

name: Playdough Cookie
descriptionHtml: Grants multicolored tears. Each color comes with a different status or tear effect.

name: Pluto
descriptionHtml: Significantly shrinks Isaac, allowing him to squeeze between objects and makes some enemy shots pass over him. Also gives +0.7 tears.

name: Psy Fly
descriptionHtml: Spawns a fly orbital familiar that chases and deflects enemy shots and converts them into homing tears that deal 2 damage. Turns some Fly enemies into friendly Blue Flies if it touches them while deflecting shots.

name: Purgatory
descriptionHtml: While in a room with enemies, spawns cracks on the ground. Walking over these cracks summons ghosts that launch themselves at enemies and explode.

name: Quints
descriptionHtml: The first five enemies killed in a room will spawn stationary shooting familiars where they died.

name: Red Stew
descriptionHtml: Refills all heart containers. Grants an enormous damage boost that wears off over time.

name: Redemption
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a soul heart and +1 damage if he goes into a Devil Room but doesn't take anything from it.

name: Revelation
descriptionHtml: Grants flight and two soul hearts. In addition to tears, Isaac can charge up and fire a powerful holy laser.

name: Rock Bottom
descriptionHtml: Locks Isaac's attributes to their highest values reached.

name: Rocket in a Jar
descriptionHtml: +5 bombs. If Isaac is currently moving, placing a bomb will instead shoot a fast-moving, explosive rocket in the direction he's facing.

name: Rotten Tomato
descriptionHtml: Adds a chance to fire tears that Mark enemies. Marked enemies are attacked by other enemies.

name: Sacred Orb
descriptionHtml: Prevents low-quality items from spawning, greatly increasing the quality of items received from all item pools.

name: Salvation
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a halo that summons beams of light on enemies inside it. The halo grows larger the more times Isaac has taken damage this floor.

name: Sanguine Bond
descriptionHtml: Spawns a special set of spikes in the Devil Room. Taking damage from the spikes has a chance to grant a reward.

name: Saturnus
descriptionHtml: Upon entering a room, a circle of tears orbits Isaac. Enemy tears have a chance to be caught in orbit, turning them friendly.

name: Sausage
descriptionHtml: Adds a Red Heart Container, fully heals Isaac, and gives +0.2 Speed, +0.5 Damage, +0.5 Tears, +1.5 Range, +0.2 Shot Speed, and +1.0 Luck.

name: Sol
descriptionHtml: Reveals the location of the Boss room. Upon defeating a boss, activates XIX - The Sun, fully recharges Isaac's active item, grants bonus damage and luck for the rest of the floor, and removes curses.

name: Soul Locket
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a permanent stat boost whenever he picks up a soul heart.

name: Spirit Shackles
descriptionHtml: On death, Isaac's ghost is chained to his dead body and he can continue to fight with 1/2 of a heart, returning to life after 10 seconds. After it activates, it must be recharged by picking up a soul heart.

name: Spirit Sword
descriptionHtml: Instead of tears, Isaac swings a sword. Charging does a spin attack and fires a projectile, and a projectile is sometimes fired with normal swings if Isaac has no empty red hearts.

name: Stapler
descriptionHtml: +1 damage. Prevents Isaac from firing tears from one eye, like Cain.

name: Star of Bethlehem
descriptionHtml: Spawns a star familiar that slowly travels towards the Boss Room, giving an aura that increases damage and tears and grants homing tears.

name: Strawman
descriptionHtml: Spawns a controllable Keeper to fight enemies alongside Isaac, functioning similarly to Jacob and Esau. If Keeper dies, he spawns 5 blue spiders and Strawman is removed from Isaac's inventory.

name: Supper
descriptionHtml: Grants one full Red Heart container. Heals 1 additional heart of health.

name: Terra
descriptionHtml: Replaces tears with rocks that deal variable damage, have increased knockback, and can destroy obstacles.

name: The Intruder
descriptionHtml: A familiar burrows in Isaac's head, firing 4 slowing tears. Upon taking damage, there's a chance it will burst out of Isaac's head, spawning blue spiders and chasing enemies for the current room.

name: The Stairway
quote: May you get what you came for
descriptionHtml: Generates a ladder at the start of every floor that leads to a unique Angel Room shop.

name: The Swarm
descriptionHtml: Spawns eight orbital flies, which turn into Blue Flies after they block a shot. Each time a room is cleared, spawns another orbital fly.

name: Tinytoma
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a Teratoma orbital that blocks shots, deals contact damage, and splits into smaller versions of itself upon taking damage. The smaller versions break into blue spiders.

name: TMTRAINER
quote: ZZaZZ ZZdZZiZZmZZhZZ ZZvZZ ZZoZZ ZZ ZZsZZlZZhZZsZZoZZaZZiZZ
descriptionHtml: Causes all future items to be "glitched", granting them completely random effects.

name: Tooth and Nail
descriptionHtml: Isaac periodically turns into a spiked statue, briefly becoming invulnerable and dealing contact damage.

name: Tropicamide
descriptionHtml: +1.5 range, Increases tear size.

name: Twisted Pair
descriptionHtml: Spawns two familiars that float on either side of Isaac and fire tears that use his tears, range, shot speed, and tear effects, and scale with damage.

name: Uranus
descriptionHtml: Isaac shoots ice tears, which slow enemies and freeze monsters they kill. Frozen enemies slide away and explode into ice shards when touched.

name: Vanishing Twin
descriptionHtml: Spawns a familiar that becomes a clone of the floor's boss when entering the boss room. Defeating it drops an extra item.

name: Vasculitis
descriptionHtml: Enemies explode into tears upon death, which inherit the effects of Isaac's tears.

name: Vengeful Spirit
descriptionHtml: After taking damage, spawns an orbital wisp that lasts for the entire floor, up to a maximum of six. They fire tears but do not block shots.

name: Venus
descriptionHtml: Adds one red Heart container. Enemies near Isaac become charmed.

name: Voodoo Head
descriptionHtml: Spawns an additional curse room on each floor.

name: Worm Friend
descriptionHtml: Gives Isaac a Nerve Ending familiar that burrows out of the ground to grab and deal damage to enemies over time.

name: Tonsil
descriptionHtml: Grants a familiar that can block enemy shots.
